title: Tree business
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, John Martin-Jones and Don Saunders
brief_description: A forest survey team is shown working in New Guinea, using modern methods of selecting and evaluating areas for commercial operations. Timber and forest products were always important, and efficient exploitation makes logging a major industry, briefly shown in operation
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, John Martin-Jones and Don Saunders
